###

<p>Full frontend application using PWA to comprehensively display religious hymns and songs on any screen resolution without internet access caching.</p>

###

<div>
  <img width="100%" src="./screenshot.webp"  />
</div>

###

- Using [Next.js](https://nextjs.org/docs) framework with Pages Router ( /pages )
- Build by [pnpm](https://pnpm.io/) package manager
